qas.question: When is the term 'German dialects' used in regard to the German language?
What are traditional region varieties of German distinguished from?

answers.text: the regional varieties of modern standard German

qas.question: Which term is only used for nontraditional varieties?
Which term is only used for national varieties?
In reference to modern varieties, what term is only used for traditional regional languages?

plausible_answers.text: regional varieties of modern standard German

qas.question: What does this allow the to remain undistinguished from?

plausible_answers.text: regional varieties of modern standard German

qas.question: Because of this, what is ancient standard German distinguished from?
